name: Stephen S.
text: Went in tonight not knowing how things worked, so it was a bit surprising that it is somewhat similar to a national sub chain. That being said, when ordering it was nice to choose the amount of toppings that you want on your pie. I‚Äôm not ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah J
text: VEGAN PIZZA! Friendly, helpful staff. Made sure they even changed their gloves and used a separate slicer.  Reasonably priced, tasty food and drink. Can't wait to go back!

name: ikc
text: Very good pizza build your own. You can watch them make your pizza and tell them to add more or less of what you like. They have an online app where you can order your food ahead of time. It does get busy around dinner time.

name: Michael Szczudlik
text:
Stopped in last week. Build your own.
Very good. I will return.

name: Tameesh Bagga
text: For the size pizza it's a not worth the price. Also they don't give you utensils when you order. They just put it at our door without even attempting to knock on our door. 3 stars is just being a bit nice but I wouldn't order from here again. On a positive quality would actually be a 3 star rating.

name: Vanessa Wenner
text: Blaze specializes in pizza. They have many varieties, options, and portions. You never have to wait long for your food. It always comes out fresh and piping hot. If you like New York style thin crust pizza then you'll love their pizza. It ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrea
text: The service is always fast no matter how busy. Usually very crowded with SUNY students grabbing food. But I remember the lady who is always nice to me, she moved next door to Halal Guys. Glad to see her happy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lia Lim
text: The concept of Blaze making your pizza right in front of you and serving it to you fresh is great and so creative, however- This isn't your pizza place is you prefer thick-crusted pizza like me. Also, the store is NOT clean. Whenever I go ‚Ä¶More

name: Ariella Love B
text: Great customer service and I was so happy that they were open late. They even had keto crust !! All the staff was polite too. One issue was though I have was waiting for my pizza the tables were a little dirty but otherwise great place.

name: Justin Kopenski
text: Food was good, huge selection great for people who can't have dairy, service was good. Would of have 5 stars but the employees work way to leisurely. Watched the guy just stair off in the sky for about 2 minutes instead of cutting my pizza.

name: Linda Brant
text: Very busy with a line out the door but everyone was on point & moved thru orders quickly including orders made online for pickup. Pizzas are excellent, great ingredients, great flavors!

name: Andrew Anable
text: Blaze is lit. Delicious pizza but its the customization that puts it over the top. Holy mackerel there is a ton of options. Reasonable prices too and they don't upcharge for multiple meats. Its great.

name: John
text: Had a wonderful experience. The customer service was amazing. Due to a mix up, I received 2 pizza instead of one.

name: Angel Woodward
text: Great service and amazing food. I can't wait to go again

name: Kamla Williams
text: I have never been to this restaurant but my daughter took me to lunch there.  So glad that she did.  I'm not a fan of pizza or can I say, not a fan of red sauce but they had other choices. They had various meats, cheeses and veggies to choose from, no pizza has to be alike.  Awesome

name: Crystal Guzman
text: Absolutely amazing pizza if you like thin crust pizza like I do. Specialty drinks are also great. Service was fast and friendly.

name: John Jones
text: Interesting take on pizza. You make your own pizza which toppings and ingredients you like. All done in front of you. The pizza was solid and it's a good place to enjoy with some friends or family.

name: Rawad Elias
text:
Service - super friendly
Flavor - amazing
Price - unbeatable ‚Ä¶More

name: Yoyo Yoyo
text: If I could give it zero star I would. First of all I received my order was 3 salad and 3 pizza. when I started eating the salad I found a lady bug in there of course it was disgusting and I couldn‚Äôt even eat anything else. My husband was ‚Ä¶More

name: Sebastian Black
text:
Its fresh, it's fast and it's got hot melted cheese.
I love a thin crust, so yeah it's not the Bronx but for WNY it's AOK.

name: matthew henderson
text: A must try for anyone that loves pizza! There are vegan options available too.

name: Sean Grohman
text: Pretty basic for ordering. The girl behind the counter took our orders and asked if we'd been there before. We hadn't and we're glad she had asked. No upcharges on extra toppings and we could get extra of anything we wanted. All three of ‚Ä¶More

name: Ali D
text: Blaze is in a really good location. Fast and efficient pizza and salad making!! With many choices.....best low carb pizza ever!! And outdoor seating!!!

name: Brian Pacos
text: A very poorly-managed location. Pizzas are thrown into the oven without any identification on them so what comes out is anyone's guess. One for our party had to be entirely remade as a result of this major lack of organization. Lots of ‚Ä¶More

name: Chrissy
text: We LOVE Blaze Pizza. We recently moved to Buffalo from Pittsburgh and were so excited to see that we lived near Blaze. The ingredients are fresh, we love the seasonal ones and it‚Äôs so much fun to build your own pizza! Plus it‚Äôs so delicious. It‚Äôs by FAR our favorite pizza.

name: Krista B
text: Love eating here! Line is often long at peak hours but it goes by fast.

name: Miles O'Brien
text: Fast and good. If you need pizza in 20 minutes or less, they have you covered. Pizza can be a little burned but some people like it that way.

name: Ke Z
text: Amazing fast pizza, the flavor is awesome the crust is crunchy and thin, the price is reasonable. You just can't stop eating it, they also let you add unlimited toppings at the end of the craft. Everyone should try this place!

name: Lizzy Rebmann
text: Staff is very friendly. I always order ahead because it gets busy, but that's because the pizza is delicious!

name: Ronald Rambally
text: Love this place...they will put whatever you want on your pie...this is my go-to for pizza!

name: Jay H
text: The staff here is always incredibly nice and the service is awesome. I love that they have we can cheese here, the dough never folds, the toppings are always fresh, and the pizza always tastes amazing. I love to come here at least once a week!

name: Roksolana Nonyak
text: Service was helpful and fast. They explain everything if it's your first time there and lead you through the choices. Pizza was amazing! Definitely worth trying out! Toppings were fresh and everything was very clean!

name: Joseph Tilton
text: This is an excellent place for pizza. Their are some many choices for making your own pizza. You can get very creative here. The ingredients are very fresh and their is plenty of seating. The staff is very nice and above all the prices are ‚Ä¶More

name: Em Waldvogel
text: Service is definitely slower because of social distancing measures and the increased number of mobile orders they receive now. Expect to wait 20-30 minutes between walking in and walking out if you plan to order in-store. The quality is the same though! Definitely worth the wait.

name: Bryan McGowan
text: Lots of variety and taste is pretty good. The staff is friendly and things come out pretty quick. The downside is that when they're busy ingredients tend to mix together and/or run out. Not a huge deal though

name: Nicole B
text: I decided on having Blaze pizza during the Corona-19 outbreak.  I walked in and the one employee asked if I need assistance,  I responded not yet just looking at the menu  because I couldn't get it to work on my phone. The employee then ‚Ä¶More

name: melanie gonzalez
text: Love that they make the pizza fresh in front of you. They ask about the amount of toppings and make every pizza to your liking.

name: Miad Hoque
text: Love it, got the white top pizza, it is made fresh to order and they're quick! Service was great, everyone is friendly and fast. Pizza is certainly not the "Buffalo style" which is a good thing or else this place wouldn't stand out from the ‚Ä¶More

name: Jake Oztan
text: Really slow service, made worse by any accessory foods like knots being made after the pizza. They earned one star because they successfully made a pizza, which was not worth the wait

name: Khamel C
text: The food was amazing! I ordered a personal 2 topping pizza and signed up for the rewards program.  I instantly received a reward for a free regular drink in which I chose the mango infused water.   The drink was satisfying, the store was ‚Ä¶More

name: Alicia Sholtz
text: Great pizza....first time here. Fast and friendly.  Could have been a little cleaner......counter where drinks were and soda machine were a little messy. However did not appear to be long term problem.

name: Matthew G
text: I love being able to make different types of pizza every time I order

name: John Lauer
text: Not a good place for "buffalo" style pizza if that is what you are looking for. Build your own pizza is fun

name: Work in Progress
text: First time there and vegan, delicious!!! Definitely going again.

name: Savage Raven
text: Its was Soooooooooo good. 10 put of 10. Loved the warm greeting. Looking forward to returning.

name: Mitch Maxick
text: Blaze Pizza is a nice pizza style interpretation of the conveyor belt style of ordering: move down the line adding different toppings as you see them. The food is fresh and the people there are efficient and friendly. They have adequate ‚Ä¶More

name: Dardra Drake
text: Best darn pizza n I picked my favorite toppings. Will definitely go again

name: Nancy Keller Stark
text: Found the fact that they automatically add a tip when ordering online is unacceptable. It cannot be removed and has no option to do so. When I called to have the tip removed they said all they could do was cancel the order. They were also obstinate and rude about it.

name: Brandon Yee
text: Good artisan stuff, cool ingredients and thin crust, well made pizza

name: pinkloveslife
text: The idea of custom pizza sounds great. The thin crust are my type of pizza as such I have visited here more than once. My fav is sausage pepperoni with basil. I have tried veggie ones as well and they are ok.

name: Tabitha Retzer
text:
One Plus. the Doug knots are AMAZING!

So, usually, things go well and when we order ahead and the food is ready when ‚Ä¶More

name: R.
text: Pretty good custom pizza place all things considered. A far sight better than Pi Craft across the street. No disrespect to Pi Craft- Blaze just does it better. Fresh ingredients, crispy thin crust, and interesting aqua fresca beverages. Staff feels a little unmotivated most of the time, but I get it. Overall I enjoy the place still.

name: Dorian Volsch
text: Blaze is our FAVORITE pizza joint in Buffalo. Coming from Texas, we were ecstatic to see that a Blaze was being built here when we relocated to Buffalo. We couldn‚Äôt recommend it enough. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Pearson
text: Great pizza for a good deal. You can't get this many quality toppings on a pizza anywhere else! I'm lactose intolerant and they carry a vegan cheese and all the employees will change their gloves when you ask to help lower the chances of spill overs!

name: JOE D.
text: What cool concept! Build your own pizza, brick fired right in front of you. High quality ingredients,  good service,  great food. Winner!

name: Rebecca Haseley
text: Very good with tasty gluten free options. Best hand prepared pizza in town. Better than picraft and pieomine, but expect smelly farts later. üòù

name: Faye Michel
text: They make your pizza just the way you like it..

name: Tyner Brooks
text: Always good food. We have been to this location many times. Just as good as the other Blaze Pizza we have been to in the past. We love the fact you can get as many toppings as you want without paying for each. They also have coke products which is what we prefer.

name: Lillie Caskey
text: This was our first time going after wanting to for a while. The "build your own pizza" option is awesome; my partner and I have very different tastes in pizza toppings. This let us both get exactly the kind of pizza we wanted! On top of ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Eldredge
text: 420 Blaze (But seriously this place is pretty great, decent prices for a build your own, a ton of options for toppings, customer service is pleasant but not exceptional. There are options for gluten free crust and vegan toppings as well. The pizza size is great to share with one other person or take leftovers for tomorrow's lunch.)

name: Brandon Mante
text: Food is great and looks amazing for how fast it is prepped üëç definitely recommend. ( white top with bbq sauce üòÅü§ô)

name: Luis Rodriguez
text: Good pizza, fast service. Affordable

name: Vlad Yakusevich
text: Initially I've placed 5 stars, but we had an issue with our order. We like this place and, as usually, ordered a BYO Pizza. We were waiting at counter for our pizza, but the guy, who is responsible for final step (adding bbq sauce\oil ‚Ä¶More

name: nicole stevens
text: Yummy pizza and great staff members

name: pam swarts
text: I was told by someone that they had gluten-free options and I happen to be in the plaza where the pizzeria was so I ordered a gluten-free pizza for myself and a regular pizza for my friend . The sauce tasted like tomato paste and the dough ‚Ä¶More

name: Elliott Astro-Imaging
text: First time ever coming here and am pleasantly surprised....never heard of this place but the pizza is amazing!!! Got the meat lovers and they make the pizza in front of you and you get it the way you want it...staff was very nice and fast...would recommend to anyone and will definitely come back here!!!!

name: Phuong Katie Le
text: So creative pizzas. I can go with vegan pizza by building my own. Price is reasonable. My husband and me love it

name: Sara Schreckengost
text: Our favorite pizza place!! Family of 3 with very different tastebuds! Cheaper than trying to get something this personalized from any of the pizzerias in the area! Mine is the picture: no sauce, mozz & parm cheese, grilled chicken & black ‚Ä¶More

name: Thivya Muhunthan
text: I usually go there to pick up orders, however the wait is usually long. They say 3-4 mins but it takes 20 mins.

name: Stacy Criswell
text: Clean place. Warm atmosphere. Friendly, helpful staff. Options limited for pizza, but everything is right in front of you. Fresh quality ingredients, just more on the healthy size. ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber Morgan
text: Servers are so organized for just opening recently. Really good pizza, that tastes and looks healthy. Definitely will be back! üòä

name: Anudeep Reddy
text: The place is amazing. We can build our own pizza with any number of toppings and they bake it in front of us. The pizza tastes great and is a nice place to hangout. I'm not entirely impressed by their customer service. Infact a part of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Cathy Chilton
text: Very cool, great wood fire, thin crust artisanal pizzas. Make, create your own w/ as little or as many different toppings as you want, or one of their creations- friendly staff, clean, eat in or take out. Definitely recommend. Innovative.

name: Nick
text: Loved the look of the place. Food was quick and actually pretty good. Prices leave a bit to be desired. But looking back at it $25 for lunch and drinks for two isn't too bad considering what else is around the area. Nice little spot for lunch on your break from work or out shopping. Would try Blaze agian.

name: Tim Cook
text: This emerging trend of build-your-food-in-line can be pretty hit or miss. This place is on the far extreme of amazing. The ingredients are fresh and really tasty. The crust is delicious. It's pretty consistent, I've been a ton of times and ‚Ä¶More

name: Peter Zhang
text: Ever see someone drop a slice of pizza on the ground? It‚Äôs heartbreaking. Today a strong gust of wind knocked my entire pizza out of my box, splattering onto my clothes, car keys and the parking lot. I went back inside and sheepishly asked ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerry Willard
text: Since visiting blaze during COVID  I‚Äôve run into issues with this location from order processing to the place being clearly understaffed & messy but I stopped by early today and got 2 gluten-free pies & I must say MARKED IMPROVEMENT I ‚Ä¶More

name: Verina Waldner
text: Best pizza ever!

name: Brian K
text: I really love the keto pizzia!

name: Laura Weir
text: We had a really great time as a family at Blaze. There was a mixup between my pizza and another customer's, but the staff took care of it. Pizza was delicious and didn't take long and pricing was fair. The real highlight though was the ‚Ä¶More

name: Francis Naung
text: Great pizzas. Love the high-rise crust. Blaze have some good deals on the app too!

name: Lizzy K
text: Create your own pizza is simply the best choice at Blaze. I mix the red spicy sauce with regular red pizza sauce to start, I add shredded mozzarella and goat cheese, add all the veggies you want (or meats). If you like basil, get the fresh ‚Ä¶More

name: Miranda Albini
text: I like the food here but the service is more than questionable. Ordered online and when I showed up to pick it up, it wasn‚Äôt ready. After waiting 5 minute, I asked if they were going to have it ready soon and they said they forgot about ‚Ä¶More

name: Joaquin Carbonara
text: I had a gluten free vegan pizza at Blaze Pizza last night. Loved it! The service was fast and convenient.

name: Joanne Bader
text: You made the Pizza the way you like

name: Kate Mattison
text: Their pizza is great and they have a lot of options! I highly appreciate their care for customers with food allergies, they always offer to change gloves before making my pizza as soon as I mention my allergy and get ingredients from closed ‚Ä¶More

name: Rashaan McGrath
text: I don't know why I waited so long to try Blaze pizza before. I ended up coming here after a school concert and trying the pizza and salad combo. I definitely like the options of what you could do to each pizza and then the drizzles ‚Ä¶More

name: Pierre T
text: Always a delight when coming here to eat. Friendly staff and great pizza!

name: Nicholas Green
text: Vegan/plant based options are so great here.  Plenty of choices and the employees change out their gloves/utensils unprompted when dealing with allergens.  Elevated to favorite pizza place around.

name: Cliff Tremblay
text: The pizza is pretty good. They don't really go out their way to keep the Dining room clean though.There was also a lady who appeared to be a manager taking an employee to task in front of us and it was pretty awkward. Do it out of sight of the customer if you must.

name: Garey Wagner
text: Absolutely love this place. I enjoy thin crust pizza a lot and the fast fire make your own pizza is my favorite. This location in particular always has an awesome staff who seem to enjoy their job and are very friendly. Its always clean and ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeanniepop
text: Had a great experience here , very friendly staff and great food!!! Lots of choices!! Very clean and comfortable sitting areas!! Will definitely be coming back!!!

name: Drake DeJesus
text: Pizza was excellent and service was fast. With so many different options Blaze provides an excellent variety for pizza lovers.

name: Walt P
text: I have ordered online for pickup several times, more often then not the food was not prepared on time when the place wasn't even busy. Team needs better management.

name: Jeff Reberholt
text: Tables were dirty. Keto crust was not crisp at all despite requesting well done. Soggy and gross.

name: irene caesar
text: The pizza was absolutely delicious and our server was very nice! This is not our neighborhood, but we will definitely come back!

name: Christina Carter
text: My pizza was excellent! Just the right amount of everything on it. I love garlic too so the chopped garlic on top was a plus. They also did not skimp on the mozzarella cheese and let you add whatever other toppings you want. I only added red onions to the White Top Pizza and it was a nice addition.

name: Chris Russell
text: Interesting concept; Moe's Southwestern Grill meets Pizza Hut.  A lot of different possibilities - almost overwhelming.  There are a few prearranged options as well.  The staff is relatively nice but it almost rushing.  The food is good though.

name: Cornelia Simmons
text: This was my first time trying Blaze Pizza and I must say that it was very delicious and very reasonably priced. I got the Green Stripe pizza and I have no complaints. I am on Weight Watchers and these pizzas make it very easy for me to stay within my points. I will definitely be going again and soon!

name: David Terry
text: Love the keto crust.  Unless you have an allergy have them cook the keto crust on the oven without the pad, comes out crispy and just plain better.

name: laurel austin smith
text: I have been to the location in Erie, PA so I was excited to see one in Amherst. This experience was horrible. They were inefficient and didn't have the order complete. The cashier wore gloves while touching money and the cash register then ‚Ä¶More

name: Syreeta Parker
text: Love it!  Fresh ingredients.   Friendly service.  GREAT  food including vegan and gluten free options which are perfect for my family's needs.

name: Kelly Isaac
text: Had a make it your own vegan pizza and it was delicious this was my fist time there and I will definitely be back.

name: Brett Stanwich
text: Blaze pizza was ok.  2 suggestions 1st: label the parmesan cheese shaker and garlic shaker.  I unfortunately, made the mistake  and ended up with unwanted garlic on one of our pizzas. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom S.
text: Can't say enough about this place.  Options,  price and quality abound.  Great for family dining as well.

name: Jason Velazquez
text: Great pizza ..I love this spot . Tons of toppings to add to your pizza

name: IC Epicfarts
text: The best unlimited topping pizza!! Always top quality and cheap.  Cannot go wrong for pizza here!  Wish there was more locations

name: Lenny Montanaro
text: Loved it.  First time there.  The service was very efficient and the establishment was very clean.  Priced very reasonably.  We shared an Art and White pizzas, and both were delicious.

name: Liberty Prime
text: Superb freedom discs!

name: Ayat Firas
text: Vegan pizza so good üëå

name: Dara Sy
text: Make your own pizza!

name: Sarah Comfort
text: I thought their pizza was excellent.   I really enjoy choosing the different toppings and everything seemed really fresh.  The service was great,  they were willing to answer questions.   I enjoyed eating out by the fireplace.

name: JASON MONTANEZ
text: This is the place to go if you want a healthy option of pizza. Now this company from what I hear is backed and owned by Lebron James. This franchise location is always busy and seating can be very limited. So keep that in mind when going. I ‚Ä¶More

name: JD Brummer
text: "Lost" my pizza & ticket. After 30 minutes of no one helping to find my pizza, it was finally discovered, pushed aside underneath some to-go boxes even though it was supposed to be a dine-in order. Pizza was cold & soggy on top, burnt on ‚Ä¶More

name: angel
text: Good service and polite people üòç

name: Amanda Jenkins
text: Hip fun atmosphere. We were there for a school fundraiser. The staff worked like a well oiled machine. Pizza was good. Lots of options. We will definitely be returning

name: Christine Wolf
text: Always great food!

name: a black
text: Met some friends here to catch up, love the idea of making my own pizza. Sat outside on the patio, great atmosphere. Will go again when I come back to WNY for a visit!

name: Isaac Mulholland
text: The make your own pizza has great choices. I recommend

name: Nancy Dormann
text: Very good pizza. Not your average pie. Think crust which you can double for an extra $2. Make your own pizza is great. Custom topping and lots of them. Vegan friendly too. I would recommend a try

name: taylan sen
text: Very slow, online pick up time estimate is way too early. Waiting orders are not kept warm if you don't immediately pick up. Pizza tasted good.

name: Edward Pierce
text: Stop in and check out the varieties of pizza that is available for you to choose from! Both meat lovers and vegans have choices. Close to many shopping opportunities and plenty of other businesses. Very quick service and very friendly staff to assist you.

name: Lee Michel
text: I really like this place.  It's cost friendly, the pizza is great, a huge amount of topping choices, friendly staff and it's really pretty quick for a great wood fired pizza.

name: steven yeh
text: Gluten free cauliflower crust with vegetarian toppings...ao good!

name: Makis Simatos
text: Amazing ....since I created it myself

name: Vee D
text:
Amazing Pizza, 10$ for an 11" w/unlimited toppings and a side, and can pre-order online
up to even setting the time they stick it in the oven, can't beat it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Hamilton
text: Great pizza, and you can put as much on a build-your-own as you want, so it's very filling. (Imagine Subway where you go down the line and say you want this, that, and some more of that as they build your pizza.)  One pizza might be enough ‚Ä¶More

name: Pamela Greathouse
text: Its awesome to be able to make your own pizza.  The food is wonderful!  The staff is great.  Will be back!

name: Bord3rhopp3r 12
text: Staff is great here and the pizzas are so yummy. From the time of order to earing is minute. They make pizza ordering kinda fun.

name: Devan Wiech
text: Friendly and upbeat staff and good food.

name: Reinardo Castoire Jr
text: What pizza lover doesn't like a personal size pizza made to your liking! Great pizza at a great price! Fresh ingredients coupled with fire baked oven equals a yummy experience!

name: Mohammad Rizek
text: Great pizza with great prices!

name: Tianyi Zhou
text: Delicous pizzaÔºÅHad a good time with my friend here.

name: Carol Acker
text: It's a neat place, pizza was filling,very thin crust, for the thin lovers out there, and very tasty. Love the choice of toppings, and I did have mine cooked a bit more, to get a crunch, with all my flavors of toppings. I would definitely go ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Prigg
text: Excellent service and amazing food. Cozy place.

name: Joshua Peterson
text: Adequate pizza a little over priced. The schtick is that you can top it with unlimited toppings for one price.

name: George Konstantakis
text: Great pizza and salad

name: S T
text: Good food, quick, friedlmdly service

name: Jack Li

name: Ethan
text: I've been there twice, the first time was ok and the pizza was good.  The second time I was on a lunch break and waited only to find out they forgot about our pizzas and burnt them both. We were the only 2 customers that had pizzas in the ‚Ä¶More

name: Rebecca Snyder

name: Charles Hidy
text: We go several tines a week...good food good prices

name: Jacob Dennis
text: I'm very pleased with the customer service I received. Beginning with the gentleman making my pizza who was very friendly, making small talk with us while he was preparing the pizzas. One of the ladies accidentally dropped my pizza while ‚Ä¶More

name: Fractal Audio
text: Fast and delicious.

name: Miranda Kofod
text: When done right, Blaze is super good. I've always had good pizza at Blaze stores throughout the country. Buffalo is an exception. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Morris
text: I made a bad choice on my order. Didn't know the BBQ chicken didn't have sauce in it. Was like eating dry toast and cheese. My friend's meat lovers looked good

name: Richard Burgin
text: Quick friendly service

name: Princess Katrina
text: I absolutely love this place

name: Tricia Wallace
text: I first had this pizza a few months ago when visiting Pittsburgh,  PA.  When I found out a few weeks ago that we now had one in the Buffalo area I was very excited.  This wood fire pizza is the best pizza I've ever tasted.  The service was good and the line moved very quickly.  The pizza was absolutely delicious!  Can't wait to go back!

name: Chris Karam
text: This is not your conveyer belt pizza.. MUCH  better a+++++

name: diane dibuono
text: Great place to make your own pizza and variaties of items.

name: Joanna Smith
text: You want a decadent and delicious pizza?? This is definitely the place to go!!! My husband and I have been here several times since they opened, always friendly staff, super fresh ingredients and nice family atmosphere. I can't say enough! The owners and operators should be very proud of themselves!!

name: Philip Schrader
text: Blaze tastes great and everytime the service has been exceptional.

name: Kelly Grudzinski
text: Love this place! Foods flavorful able to customize your pizza which is made in fire oven reasonable for someone on a budget

name: Andria Baunee
text: Great, thin pizza. Made-to-order like Subway for pizza! Inexpensive prices. Each pizza is enough for a man or to share for children or smaller appetites. Best lemonade - blood orange!!

name: Michael Gould
text: This pizza is very good! The make your own is very cheap for what it's worth! The only problem is that some of the sauce is very strong and it takes away from the pizza!

name: D Feng
text: Very reasonable prices for the byo pizza; there was a wide selection of toppings to choose from. The atmosphere is very nice, and there's an outdoor dining area as well.

name: Thomas Michaels
text: Great food and great service....keep it up guys!

name: Dan Thomas
text: Great price for good pizza crust with awsome selection of ingredients.

name: Lydia Taylor
text: Blaze pizza love building my own pizza. Employees are great. Pizza is good as well

name: Shawn Yarrow
text: Love the thin crust, oven baked blaze pizza's

name: S M
text: Good food.

name: Michael Thompson
text: I really like the vegan style here more than reg cheese pizza

name: Jeanne Kreuder
text: Delicious wood oven pizza.  Gluten free and attentive to cross contamination.  You choose the toppings and they bake it while you wait, about 5-10 minutes. Salads and garlic knots available, too.Self serve soda machine with Iced tea available.  Outdoor seating is very pleasant, with some games for children.

name: Samantha C
text: So good, 100% my favorite 'artisan' pizza place.

name: Huyfinity
text: Awesome unique style of build your own pizza joint! Never dull! Enthusiastic staff and experience!

name: Adam Link
text: Great service! Amazing pizza! 2 pizzas and a drink for $21.15 w/tax
